paper_abstract: In this paper the one-machine scheduling problem with linear earliness and tardiness costs is considered. The cost functions are job dependent and asymmetric. The problem consists of two sub-problems. The first one is to find a sequence of jobs and the second one is to find the job completion times that are optimal for the given sequence. We consider the second sub-problem and propose an algorithm solving the problem in O(n log n) time. (c) 2005 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Minimizing the earliness-tardiness costs on a single machine
